alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Fayette; Franklin; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 5:41PM EDT until August 25 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Woodford County in central Kentucky... Scott County in central Kentucky... West central Bourbon County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Fayette County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Franklin County in central Kentucky... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 541 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Georgetown, Paris, Midway, Stamping Ground, Sadieville, Longlick, Spindletop Estates, Skinnersburg and Stonewall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
